title: Carnal Desire
description: Continuing Angel and Eve's story from Severed Angel. Eve returns home unaware danger is hot on her heels. Will Satan get the revenge he seeks, will Angel save the woman he loves or will Ink get the woman he deserves. The nail biting conclusion to the story that crosses two continents... Book Two in a two part story. *** CONTAINS ADULT THEMES AND MATERIAL - OVER 18's ONLY ***
author: K.T. Fisher
